ProductInfo.Features:
GW9408H:Professional 8 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with HDMI & VGA. 960×480 & 30FPS recording, HI 3521 CPU. iPhone, Android Viewing. New color graphical menu. Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW630C: 1/3" CMOS Outdoor Camera, 650 TV lines, 3.6mm Lens, 30 IR LEDs, 82 ft IR Distance. Low Illumination 0.1 Lux. Metal vandal proof & water proof
Includes:DVR w/ 2T HDD; 6x1/3" CMOS CCD Camera;Free 19" LED;125 feet pre-made cable BNC;100 feet pre-made cable BNC;3x60 feet pre-made cable BNC;25 feet pre-made cable BNC;12V5A Power Supply For Security Cameras;1 to 8 Power Splitter Adapter Cable
